Class ExtractorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.io.ExtractorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatConstants

    public class ExtractorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements FormatConstants
    Extractor Factory. Uses format writer/reader implementations.
    Author:
    Fabio Kepler

      • ExtractorFactory

        public ExtractorFactory(java.util.Properties formatMap)
        Create a new ExtractorFactory using provided format map. Format maps must be key/value pair of syntax $mimetype=$impl (e.g. image/jpeg=gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.kdu.KduExtractExe)
        Parameters:
        formatMap -

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultFormatMap

        public static java.util.Properties getDefaultFormatMap()
        Create a new ExtractorFactory using provided format map. Format maps must be key/value pair of syntax $mimetype=$impl (e.g. image/jpeg=gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.kdu.KduExtractExe)
        Returns:
        Properties object containing extractor implementation class key/value pairs

        Get mimetype for 'file' based on its content.
        Parameters:
        file - Doesn't need to have an extension.
        Returns:
